history.heading: Having all of the following:
history.title: Having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: B. “Test”, “Inspection” and “Production Equipment”
3B994 Semiconductor manufacturing equipment that enables “advanced-node integrated circuit” production, as follows (see list of items controls).
Semiconductor wafer fabrication equipment designed for ion implantation of 300mm wafers as follows:
Ion implantation equipment as follows:
history.text:
Having all of the following:
Beam current greater than 5 mA; and
b.2.b.1. Beam current greater than 5 mA; and
Beam energy less than 5 keV; or
b.2.b.2. Beam energy less than 5 keV; or

children.heading: Beam current greater than 5 mA; and
children.label: 3B994.b.2.b.1 – Beam current greater than 5 mA; and

content.text: b.2.b.1. Beam current greater than 5 mA; and

children.heading: Beam energy less than 5 keV; or
children.label: 3B994.b.2.b.2 – Beam energy less than 5 keV; or

content.text: b.2.b.2. Beam energy less than 5 keV; or
